entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
